availability.p: TEI material can be licensed differently depending on the use you intend to make of it. Hence it is made available under both the CC+BY and BSD-2 licences. The CC+BY licence is generally appropriate for usages which treat TEI content as data or documentation. The BSD-2 licence is generally appropriate for usage of TEI content in a software environment. For further information or clarification, please contact the TEI Consortium.

body.p: Validation Schema to go with DHARMA Encoding guide for Critical Editions

valItem.desc: Jawi script - Narrower concept of Arabic Script
To be used as the first child to declare a prosodic pattern
To be used only inside the translation
Declares an alternative lemma for display purposes

sch:rule.sch:assert: The attribute @corresp is mandatory with the attribute @type translation, commentary or bibliography.
sch:rule.sch:report: The attribute @corresp can't be used with the attribute @type='edition'.
The attribute @n can't be used on div if its child its an ab element with the @type 'invocation' or 'colophon'.

sch:rule.sch:assert: The element lem is mandatory within an app entry
